title: Donation Verification Process and Inbox System
content:
DONATION VERIFICATION PROCESS

HOW IT WORKS:
1. USER MAKES TRANSFER
   - User transfers money using the banking alias
   - Transfer goes directly to rescue organization's account
   - User completes donation through their bank/Mercado Pago

2. RESCUE ORGANIZATION VERIFICATION
   - Rescue organization receives the transfer
   - They verify the donation in their account
   - They confirm the donation in Toto system

3. DONATION APPEARS IN INBOX
   - Once verified, donation appears automatically in user's inbox
   - Case conversation is saved
   - User receives confirmation notification

4. ONGOING UPDATES
   - User gets automatic notifications about case updates
   - All updates appear in their inbox
   - They can track the animal's progress

TIMING:
- Verification typically happens within a few hours
- Can take up to 24 hours in some cases
- Depends on rescue organization's processing time

INBOX FEATURES:
- All donations saved automatically
- Case history preserved
- Automatic update notifications
- Track multiple cases you've supported
- See your complete donation history

WHEN USERS ASK:
"Where's my donation?"
"How do I check if it went through?"
"When will I see confirmation?"

RESPOND WITH:
- Check your inbox in the app
- Donations appear after rescue organization verification
- Usually within a few hours
- If more than 24 hours, contact support

TRANSPARENCY:
- Direct transfers to rescue organizations
- No intermediaries
- Toto doesn't hold funds
- Complete donation tracking
- Receipt and history always available

es.note: Emphasize transparency and direct fund transfer to build trust
